title: Create test infrastructure and synthetic test video
description: Set up tests/conftest.py with fixtures: sample_video_path (10s/30fps/640x480 with frame numbers), short_video_path (2s), default_config, output_dir. Create tests/fixtures/generate_test_videos.py.
close_reason: Fixed codec compatibility (mp4v→avc1 fallback for macOS), verified conftest.py fixtures produce correct 300-frame/30fps/640x480 test videos. generate_test_videos.py also fixed.

title: Define core data models and config system
description: Implement FrameMetadata, FrameData, VideoInfo, ExtractionResult in models/frame.py. Implement ExtractionConfig, DXDConfig, load_config in config/settings.py. Update config/default.yaml.
close_reason: Implemented FrameMetadata, FrameData, VideoInfo, ExtractionResult models and ExtractionConfig, DXDConfig, load_config(). All serialize to JSON, config loads from YAML with defaults.

title: Set up git worktrees for parallel agent development
description: Create git worktrees at ~/dxd-worktrees/{backend,frontend,test} on branches backend/phase1, frontend/phase1, test/phase1. Copy .claude/settings.local.json to each worktree. Update all agent .md files with worktree paths and BEADS_NO_DAEMON=1 instruction.
close_reason: Worktrees created at ~/dxd-worktrees/{backend,frontend,test} on branches backend/phase1, frontend/phase1, test/phase1. Copied .claude/settings.local.json to all worktrees. Agent .md files already updated with worktree paths and BEADS_NO_DAEMON=1 instruction from prior session.

title: Write integration tests for Phase 1 pipeline
description: tests/integration/test_phase1_pipeline.py: 4 tests - end-to-end pipeline, CLI subprocess, JSON serialization, multiple FPS targets.
close_reason: 4 integration tests written: end-to-end pipeline, CLI subprocess exit code, JSON serialization round-trip, different FPS targets (1/5/10/30). Skipping until VisionPipeline implemented.

title: Implement CLI entry point with Click
description: Build CLI in src/dxd_vision/cli/main.py with options: --input/-i (required path), --config/-c, --output/-o, --fps, --verbose/-v. Wire __main__.py for python -m dxd_vision. Clean --help, helpful errors on invalid paths.
close_reason: CLI entry point implemented with Click: --input/-i (required, validated), --config/-c, --output/-o, --fps, --verbose/-v, --version. Clean --help, helpful errors. Wired to VisionPipeline and DisplayManager (lazy import for --help to work before pipeline is built).

title: Create detection test fixtures and mock YOLO model
description: Add conftest.py fixtures: mock_yolo_model (returns 2 person + 1 car per frame), detection_config, sample_frame_data. Mock model avoids requiring actual YOLO weights download in CI.

title: Write unit tests for VideoReader
description: tests/unit/test_video_reader.py: 12 tests covering open, video info, frame iteration, context manager, error cases (not found, unsupported format, corrupt file).
close_reason: 12 unit tests written: open, video info (count/fps/dims/duration), frame iteration (all/shape), context manager, error cases (not found/unsupported/corrupt). All 12 passing.

title: Try out Beads
Final integration verification and Phase 1 release
description: All tests green (25/25 pass), CLI works end-to-end, merges complete. Ready to tag v0.1.0-phase1
close_reason: Phase 1 integration complete: all tests passing (25/25), CLI verified end-to-end, v0.1.0-phase1 tagged

title: Implement VideoReader class
description: OpenCV wrapper in src/dxd_vision/pipeline/video_reader.py. Methods: __init__(path, config), get_video_info()->VideoInfo, read_frames()->Iterator[tuple[int, ndarray]], release(), context manager. Validate file exists, format supported. Custom exceptions in exceptions.py.
close_reason: VideoReader fully implemented: __init__ with validation, get_video_info(), read_frames() iterator, release(), context manager. All exceptions wired. Verified working.

title: Implement FrameExtractor with FPS decimation
description: Frame extractor in src/dxd_vision/pipeline/extractor.py. Methods: __init__(reader, config), extract()->Iterator[FrameData] at target FPS using timestamp-based selection, extract_all()->ExtractionResult, save_sample_frame(). This Iterator[FrameData] is THE core interface for the entire pipeline.
close_reason: FrameExtractor implemented with timestamp-based FPS decimation. extract() yields FrameData, extract_all() returns ExtractionResult, save_sample_frame() saves PNG. Verified: 90 frames@30fps -> 15 frames@5fps.

title: Write integration tests for detection pipeline
description: tests/integration/test_phase2_pipeline.py: ~5 tests — end-to-end extract+detect, CLI with --detect flag, JSON output, annotated frame, detection-disabled regression.

title: Implement detection summary and details display
description: DisplayManager: show_detection_summary(DetectionSummary) table with class counts, show_detection_details(detections, top_n) verbose view, show_processing_results(ProcessingResult) combined. Color coding: red=weapon, yellow=person, green=vehicle, blue=package. Professional defense styling, no emoji.

title: Merge frontend/phase1 and define detection data models + config
description: Merge frontend/phase1 branch (CLI hardening + Phase 2 notes). Create models/detection.py with BoundingBox, Detection, FrameDetections, DetectionSummary, ProcessingResult. Add DetectionConfig to settings.py. Update default.yaml with detection section.
close_reason: Merged frontend/phase1, created detection.py models (BoundingBox, Detection, FrameDetections, DetectionSummary, ProcessingResult), extended settings.py with DetectionConfig, updated default.yaml

title: Implement YOLODetector class
description: New file: pipeline/detector.py. YOLODetector wraps ultralytics YOLO. Methods: __init__(config), detect_frame(FrameData)->FrameDetections, detect_stream(Iterator[FrameData])->Iterator[FrameDetections]. COCO-to-DXD class mapping (person, car/truck/bus->vehicle, knife->weapon, backpack/suitcase->package). Device auto-detection: CUDA>MPS>CPU.

title: Integrate detection into VisionPipeline
description: Extend pipeline.py: process_video() runs detection when config.detection.enabled=True. Consume Iterator[FrameData] from extractor, pipe through YOLODetector. Return ProcessingResult. Preserve Phase 1 extraction-only behavior when detection disabled.

title: Initialize Git repo and project structure
description: Create full project directory structure, pyproject.toml, requirements.txt, .gitignore, README.md, and all placeholder module files for Phase 1.
close_reason: Project structure created: pyproject.toml, requirements.txt, .gitignore, README.md, config/default.yaml, all src/dxd_vision and tests placeholder modules. Dependencies install and package imports resolve.

title: Write unit tests for FrameExtractor
description: tests/unit/test_extractor.py: 9 tests covering FPS decimation at 1/5/10/30fps, metadata correctness, sample frame saving, extract_all results.
close_reason: 9 unit tests written: FPS decimation at 1/5/30fps, metadata timestamps (monotonic), dimensions, source_path, save_sample_frame PNG, extract_all returns ExtractionResult with correct count. Skipping until FrameExtractor implemented.

title: Final integration verification and Phase 2 release
description: After ALL agents finish: merge all branches, run full pytest, verify --detect CLI end-to-end, verify detection JSON + annotated frames, confirm Phase 1 regression-free, tag v0.2.0-phase2, push to GitHub.

title: Write unit tests for YOLODetector
description: tests/unit/test_detector.py: ~10 tests covering init, detect_frame, confidence filtering, class filtering, detect_stream, class mapping, empty frames, bbox bounds, summary aggregation.

title: Add detection CLI options and update logging
description: Add Click options: --detect/-d flag, --model/-m path, --confidence float, --classes comma-separated. Override config when provided. Detection-specific logging: model loading, inference timing, detection counts.

title: Build pipeline orchestrator skeleton
description: VisionPipeline in src/dxd_vision/pipeline/pipeline.py. Methods: __init__(config), process_video(path)->ExtractionResult. Thin wrapper wiring VideoReader + FrameExtractor. Grows through Phases 2-7.
close_reason: VisionPipeline orchestrator implemented. Wires VideoReader + FrameExtractor via process_video(path) -> ExtractionResult. Context-managed resource cleanup.

title: Configure structured logging
description: Implement setup_logging() in src/dxd_vision/utils/logging.py. Format: [timestamp] [LEVEL] [module] message. Verbose flag controls DEBUG vs INFO. No duplicate log entries.
close_reason: Implemented setup_logging() with structured format, verbose toggle, duplicate handler prevention, and child logger propagation.

title: Implement progress display and results formatting
description: Build DisplayManager in src/dxd_vision/cli/display.py using Rich. Methods: show_header, show_video_info (table), create_progress (progress bar), show_results (summary), show_error. Professional defense-product styling, no emoji, handle narrow terminals.
close_reason: Implemented DisplayManager with Rich: show_header (branded panel), show_video_info (metadata table), create_progress (spinner+bar+ETA), show_results (summary table), show_error. Professional styling, no emoji, handles narrow terminals.

title: Add ultralytics dependency and model download setup
description: Add ultralytics>=8.0 to requirements.txt. Verify YOLO importable. Document GPU vs CPU. Add model download note to README.
close_reason: Added ultralytics>=8.0 to requirements.txt. YOLO model will auto-download on first use. GPU auto-detection configured via device=auto.

title: Detection result serialization and annotated frames
description: Save all detections to JSON in output dir. Draw bounding boxes on sample frame and save as annotated PNG. JSON format compatible with Phase 5 alert schema from ORCHESTRATOR.md.
